intro: Michelia celebica, commonly known as the Celebes michelia, is a flowering plant native to the Moluccas in Indonesia. It belongs to the family Lauraceae and is characterized by its fragrant, white to pale yellow flowers. The plant typically grows as an evergreen shrub or small tree, reaching heights of up to 5 meters. Its leaves are simple, alternate, and have a smooth or slightly hairy surface. The fruit is a small, dark-colored drupe that develops from the flower.
